mislead.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to make someone believe something that is not true by giving them information that is false or not complete
mislead.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Don’t be misled by appearances, he’s a good worker.
Don’t be misled into thinking that scientific research is easy.
mislead somebody into believing/thinking etc something
Politicians have misled the public over the dangers of these chemicals.
